text: Nivala is a city in Northern Ostrobothnia, Finland. As of January 2014, almost 10,950 people lived there. Nearby municipalities are Haapajärvi, Haapavesi, Sievi and Ylivieska. The historical name of Nivala is Pidisjärvi. ==Other websites== * Official website * Newspaper Category:Cities in Finland Category:Municipalities of North Ostrobothnia
title: Nivala
